title: In 'Over My Dead Body', author examines hidden cemetery history
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In part two of Radio Boston going to the grave this week, we speak with journalist and author Greg Melville about his new book, "Over My Dead Body: Unearthing the Hidden History of America's Cemeteries."
itunes:author: WBUR
